1.0.1.en: Removed the tank volume in the name of the water heater as a heater with greater capacity is going to be released later

1.1.0.en: Fixed compliancy issues and simplified the maximum power control

1.1.2.en: Added norwegian text to max power selector

1.2.0.en: Added support to set some internal variables for the heater (ambient_temperature, inlet_temperature, legionella_frequency, max_water_flow and regulation_diff + added Nor

1.2.1.en: Fixed hint for legionella program frequency

1.2.2.en: Made code more reliable + added debug to understand further crashes

1.2.4.en: Changed from crashing with log to updating the unavailable state. This makes the problem clearer to the user.

1.2.5.en: Added missing unit for norwegian translation of legionella program

1.3.0.en: Added error handling in case of bad internet connection + added passive readouts of some device settings

1.3.1.en: Added cleanup function to remove ghost intervals that kept running after the device had been deleted

1.3.2.en: Fixed some crashes when fetching device values during bad internet connections

1.4.0.en: Added new capability for reporting leakage heat + minor stability improvement

1.4.1.en: Added capability to set ambient temperature + Fixed Energy leakage calculation.

1.4.2.en: Added capability to read amount of wasted energy due to leakage + added action card to set ambient temperature for improved accuracy.
